import vtktools from numpy import array vtufinal=vtktools.vtu('channel_flow_3.vtu') vtuinitial=vtktools.vtu('channel_flow_0.vtu') fieldinitial = vtuinitial.GetField("TracerCV") fieldfinal = vtufinal.GetField("TracerCV") tracerdifferencecv = max(abs(fieldinitial-fieldfinal))
